Package Notes

Class Note

java.lang.Object
Notes.Note
@Entity public class Note extends Object
This class is used to hold data for any note type and deligates work to those classes, when manipulating data with in the note. This class holds an ID number, a NoteInterface class(So either DefaultNote, ChecklistNote, or TableNote), and has a User attached to it. The ID number of the note is unchangeable be design
Author:
Nick Pehl, Cam Lettieri

  • Constructor Details

    • Note

      public Note​(NoteInterface note, User user)
      Constucts a Note Object, takes in a NoteInterface Class, and a User. ID number is auto generated by SpringBoot
      Parameters:
      note - either DefaultNote, ChecklistNote, or TableNote
      user - the User attached to this Note.

    • Note

      public Note​(int id, User user)
      Constructs a Note Object that has a id and a User. Only used for testing purposes. DO NOT USE FOR ANYTHING OTHER THAN TESTING
      Parameters:
      id - ID number of Test note
      user - User for Test note

  • Method Details

    • getUser

      public User getUser()
      Gets user for the note
      Returns:
      User attched to the note

    • setUser

      public void setUser​(User user)
      changes the user that is attached to the note
      Parameters:
      user - new user attached to the note

    • getID

      public int getID()
      Gets the ID number of the note.
      Returns:

    • getNoteInterface

      public NoteInterface getNoteInterface()
      Gets the NoteInterface object of the note either DefaultNote, ChecklistNote, or TableNote class
      Returns:
      DefaultNote, ChecklistNote, or TableNote

    • getNoteType

      public NoteType getNoteType()
      Gets the note type of the NoteInterface object either DEFAULT, CHECK, or TABLE
      Returns:
      NoteType enum of the NoteInterface class within this note

    • getFullContents

      public TextItem[][] getFullContents()
      returns the full TextItem[][] of the NoteInterface object within the class
      Returns:
      TextItem[][] data for this Note that is stored within NoteInterface

    • getContentInLocation

      public TextItem getContentInLocation​(int row, int col)
      Gets the TextIem object in a location of the NoteInterface object Please refer to NoteInterface documentation to get full details on how this is done.
      Parameters:
      row - Row to retrieve data from
      col - Column to retrieve data from
      Returns:
      data in location, as a TextItem

    • setContentInLocation

      public void setContentInLocation​(TextItem item, int row, int col)
      Sets TextItem data in a location of the note. Please refer to NoteInterface documentation to get full details on how this is done.
      Parameters:
      item - new TextItem to be set
      row - Row to set it in
      col - Column to set it in

    • getContentStringInLocation

      public String getContentStringInLocation​(int row, int col)
      Gets the String data in a location. Please refer to NoteInterface documentation to get full details on how this is done.
      Parameters:
      row - Row to retrieve data from
      col - Column to retrieve data from
      Returns:

    • editContentInLocation

      public void editContentInLocation​(String edit, int row, int col)
      Edits the String in the TextItem Object in location Please refer to NoteInterface documentation to get full details on how this is done.
      Parameters:
      edit - new String update
      row - Row to be changed
      col - Column to be changed

    • editContentSize

      public void editContentSize​(int rows, int cols)
      Changes the size of the content. Only relevant if NoteInterface class is Checklist or TableNote. Please refer to NoteInterface documentation to get full details on how this is done.
      Parameters:
      rows - updated number of Rows
      cols - updated number of Columns

    • getCheckedStatusInLocation

      public boolean getCheckedStatusInLocation​(int row)
      Gets checked status in a location. This is only relevant if NOteINterface class is ChecklistNote.
      Parameters:
      row - Row location to be checked
      Returns:
      true if checked, false if not checked

    • updateCheckedStatusInLocation

      public void updateCheckedStatusInLocation​(boolean checked, int row)
      Updates checked status in a location. This is only relevant if NOteINterface class is ChecklistNote.
      Parameters:
      checked - updated checked status
      row - where checked status is going to be updated
